channel.title: ScanX – Orders & Deals
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Orders & Deals

item.title: Samvardhana Motherson International Completes Acquisition of Remaining 10% Stake in South African Subsidiary
item.description: Top News Samvardhana Motherson International Completes Acquisition of Remaining 10% Stake in South African Subsidiary 4 hours ago Samvardhana Motherson International Limited completed the acquisition of the remaining 10% stake in Motherson Lumen Systems South Africa Pty Ltd on December 10, 2025, through its indirect wholly owned subsidiary Motherson Lumen Holding Ltd. The transaction, which was initially disclosed on December 4, 2025, has resulted in Motherson Lumen SA becoming an indirect wholly owned subsidiary of the company. The completion has been duly reported to stock exchanges in compliance with SEBI regulations, strengthening the company's operational control in the South African market.

item.title: Pharmaids Pharmaceuticals Announces Resignation of Vice President-Operations Dr. Sidde Gowda
item.description: Pharmaids Pharmaceuticals Announces Resignation of Vice President-Operations Dr. Sidde Gowda 4 hours ago Pharmaids Pharmaceuticals Limited announced the resignation of Dr. Sidde Gowda from his position as Vice President-Operations, effective December 10, 2025. The resignation was attributed to personal reasons and commitments, with no other material reasons cited. The company has completed all necessary regulatory filings under SEBI regulations.

item.title: Hubtown Limited Receives Trading Approval for 21.32 Lakh Equity Shares
item.description: Hubtown Limited Receives Trading Approval for 21.32 Lakh Equity Shares 4 hours ago Hubtown Limited has secured trading approval from both NSE and BSE for 21,31,936 equity shares issued to promoters on preferential basis following warrant conversion. The shares, priced at ₹220 each (₹10 face value plus ₹210 premium), began trading on December 11, 2025, and are subject to a lock-in period until July 31, 2027.

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 7 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.
